adj = {'STD': [{'MARS': 'single', 'year': '2019', 'value': 0}, {'MARS':
    'mjoint', 'year': 2019, 'value': 1}], 'EITC_c': [{'EIC': '0kids',
    'year': '2019', 'value': 1000.0}], 'BEN_ssi_repeal': [{'year': 2019,
    'value': True}]}
res = helpers.convert_adj(adj, 2019)
assert res == {'STD': {(2019): [0, 1, 12200.0, 18350.0, 24400.0]}, 'EITC_c':
    {(2019): [1000.0, 3526.0, 5828.0, 6557.0]}, 'BEN_ssi_repeal': {(2019): 
    True}}
pytest.mark.full_run
